p: NMR spectra were recorded at 500 MHz for 1H and 125 MHz for 13C on a Bruker Avance DMX400 FT-NMR spectrometer (Bruker, Billerica, Massachusetts, USA) using tetramethylsilane (TMS) as internal standard. All spectra were measured in CDCl 3, except for compound 1, which was dissolved in CD 3OD. HRMS were determined on a Shimadzu LC‐MS Advanced spectrometer (Shimadzu, Kyoto, Japan) in the positive and negative modes.
